text: Jean-Pierre Dufau (born 5 July 1943 in Capbreton) is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Landes department, and is a member of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:People from Landes (department) Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Jean-Pierre Dufau
